dcterms:creator: S. Pradhan
A. Moschitti
N. Xue

dcterms:description: The dataset contains 2802 documents for training, 343 documents for validation, and 348 documents for testing with 7 different genres (i.e., newswire, magazine articles, broadcast news, broadcast conversations, web data, conversational speech data, and the New Testament).
dcterms:title: CoNLL-2012 Shared Task English dataset
